title: Counting Occurrences in Python Lists | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will implement a function to count the number of occurrences of a given value in a list using the built-in `list.count()` method.

meta.title: Python | List Manipulation | Counting Occurrences
meta.description: Learn how to count the number of occurrences of a specific value in a Python list using the built-in count() method. Improve your programming skills with this practical challenge.
meta.keywords: Python, List, Counting, Occurrences, Programming, Challenge
